casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

July 25, 2014

[Cite as 07/25/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-3247.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-1951. Ross v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2013-607. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals.

Upon consideration of appellants’ motion to strike appellees’ brief, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied. It is further ordered that appellants may file a reply brief within 20 days of the date of this entry.
